definition: 7th earthly branch: 11 a.m.-1 p.m., noon, 5th solar month (6th June-6th July), year of the Horse/ancient Chinese compass point: 180° (south)
Prélude à l'après-midi d'un faune, by Claude Debussy based on poem by Stéphane Mallarmé

sentences.english: Summer afternoons are frequently accompanied by thunderstorms.
sentences.chinese: 夏天的午後經常伴有雷暴雨。

sentences.english: And roamed there all the stupid afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 飄來飄去，一整個無聊的午後。

sentences.english: Xingcheng, Liaoning, China, on a windy winter afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 中國遼寧興城，一個大風的冬日午後。

sentences.english: Everyonetakes his or her seat and settles in for a lovely afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 在美麗的午後，善男信女落座於各自的位置。

sentences.english: This effect might be the main reason for the desired post-lunch siesta.
sentences.chinese: 這可能就是午後犯困的主要原因了。

sentences.english: They dragged him into the sunlight early Thursday afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 最後，人們拖着他，把他帶進週四午後的陽光裏。

sentences.english: Gray flower climbs quiet on postmeridian white brick and unruffled .
sentences.chinese: 灰色的花爬在午後的白磚上靜謐而安詳。

sentences.english: Afternoon sun, relaxing and warm the heart of Orange lit.
sentences.chinese: 午後的陽光，暖洋洋的照得內心橙黃。

sentences.english: In the afternoon sun, the sand on the beach began to heat up.
sentences.chinese: 在午後陽光的照射下，海灘上的沙開始變熱。

sentences.english: The windows reflected the bright afternoon sun-light .
sentences.chinese: 窗戶反射着午後明媚的陽光。
溼乎乎的三明治會讓你午後昏昏欲睡。

sentences.english: I will come to see you between three and four tomorrow afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 我明天午後三時到四時之間來看你。

sentences.english: One afternoon, a man came to a little tea house with measured steps.
sentences.chinese: 慵懶的午後，一男子走進一家小茶屋。

sentences.english: The dust over Sydney had largely cleared by mid-afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 悉尼的沙塵在午後大幅減少。

sentences.english: Henpecked husbands should, however, steer clear of having a row mid-afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 然而，怕老婆的丈夫應該避免在午後和老婆發生爭吵。

definition: time/period during the day/one of the 12 two-hour periods enumerated by the earthly branches 地支
